summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the submission to the qualified electors (voters) of The City of Seattle at the general municipal election to be held therein on November 6, 1973 of the initiative measure contemplated by voters' petition (C.F. 276205) directing the City to discontinue fluoridation of the municipal water supply, and to dismantle and dispose of fluoride dosing equipment and facilities, and repealing Ordinance 96931; providing for certification of such initiative measure to the Director of the Department of Records and Elections of King County and prescribing the ballot title therefor.
